se_val:
It's great that you want to contribute!

Choose your donation amount: Below you will see buttons to select your donation amount. Just click the middle button and you will be taken to the payment screen.

Please note that currently donations are only accepted in Brazilian Reais (BRL), but we will be adding more currencies soon.

Thank you so much for your support!
donation_subtitle: Make a donation to help us keep the bot running!
order_confirmed: Wow, your generosity truly warms our hearts! We are so incredibly grateful for your donation. It means the world to us that you believe in our work and want to help us make a difference. Your contribution will go a long way in helping us continue our efforts and reach our goals. We simply couldn't do it without the support of amazing people like you. Thank you from the bottom of our hearts!
